title: A booke of ayres, set foorth to be song to the lute, orpherian, and base violl, by Philip Rosseter lutenist: and are to be solde at his house in Fleetstreete neere to the Grayhound
author: Rosseter, Philip, 1567 or 8-1623.
publisher: Printed by Peter Short, by the assent of Thomas Morley,
notes: The first 21 songs are by Thomas Campion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
